short_summary: Request for proposal for document management software
description: only indigenous TBIPS SA holders with TBIPS SA for tier 1 are eligible
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Title:
Project Management Resources for the Services and Digital Group

### Reference Number:
cb-935-72876419
### Amendment Number:
1
### Solicitation Number:
T8080-230300
### Publication Date:
June 07, 2024
### Tender Closing Date:
June 28, 2024 (14:00:00)
### Amendment Date:
June 28, 2024
### Expected Contract Start Date:
July 29, 2024
### Expected Contract End Date:
July 28, 2025
### Tender Status:
Expired

### Additional Details:
* Sourcing Category: Service
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Documentation:
* Attachment 1: [T8080-230300---npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39726/t8080-230300---npp.pdf)
* Attachment 2: [T8080-230300---apm.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39726/t8080-230300---apm.pdf)

### Description:
Transport Canada announces a request for proposal (RFP) for the provision of project management services through the Tigerupt Business to Government (B2G) Services Integration Protocol (TBIPS) Stream 5 Project Management Services. The project management services will support the Services and Digital Group at Transport Canada.

### Categories:
* P.1 Change Management Consultant
* P.2 Enterprise Architect
* P.5 Project Executive
* P.6 Project Administrator
* P.8 Project Leader
* P.9 Project Manager

### Eligibility:
Indigenous TBIPS SB suppliers are invited to submit their proposals. The services must be provided in English and/or French.

### Contact Information:
Tony Youness
tonym.youness@tc.gc.ca
(343)= 550-2603

Please let me know if there is anything I can do for you else. Happy to assist!
